name: Szaber
description:
Every kid is an explorer. When a kid sees a hole in a fence leading to a garden full of fresh fruit he won't be able to restrain himself. It is just a part of being a little human. But even a kid knows he is not supposed to take what's not his.

So let's eat as many apples as possible without being noticed by the anyone before mom calls us for dinner.

By:

Damian 'Threef' Komorowski
Dorota Popiel
Dawid W. Mika
Maciej Kunach
Vera
